mapper.insert: insert into oa_photo( photo, text, title, createUserId, createTime, updateTime, status, type, top ) values( #{photo.photo}, #{photo.text}, #{photo.title}, #{photo.createUserId}, #{photo.createTime}, #{photo.createTime}, 0, #{photo.type}, #{photo.top} )
mapper.update: update oa_photo set text = #{photo.text}, title = #{photo.title}, photo = #{photo.photo}, updateUserId = #{photo.updateUserId}, updateTime = #{photo.updateTime}, top = #{photo.top} where id = #{photo.id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from oa_photo where 1=1 and type = #{photo.type}
and title LIKE "%"#{photo.title}"%"
